availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry H. Porter (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Brady Porter in Nicholas County, Kentucky, in June 1846. Father of Samuel Porter, William L. Porter, John A. Porter, and Henry E. Porter. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 3, p. 413A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 410.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film 000252406.
